dc_description_s: This layer outlines the 10 Neconomic prosperity regionsN in Governor Snyder's Region Prosperity Initiative. The Regional Prosperity Initiative is comprised of two parts, an effort by the State of Michigan to align around a common set of service delivery boundaries to create a better structure for collaboration and a local voluntary grant initiative. This geographic delineation is based on county boundaries at the lowest level. Please see the MDOT Metadata Form for additional information.Update Cycle: Michigan RPI Boundaries are static boundaries.;Coverage: This is the official boundary delineation for Governor Snyders Region Prosperity Initiative (RPI).;Contact:Brad Winkler
dc_publisher_sm: State of Michigan GIS Open Data
dct_isPartOf_sm: State of Michigan Open Data Portal
